Module jBomberman
Package controller

Class KeyListenerMenu

java.lang.Object
controller.KeyListenerMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class KeyListenerMenu extends Object implements KeyListener
Personalized version of a KeyListener to manage inputs reception during menu' (running ThreadMenu).

    • isEnter

      public boolean isEnter()
      Getter of enter condition. KeyListenerMenu's enter activates the commands of options selection if the current GameState owns it. This getter exhausts its signal in order to conform the Controller to User's digital experience.
      Returns:
      conditional signal of enter

    • isEsc

      public boolean isEsc()
      Getter of esc condition. KeyListenerGame's esc activates current panel's esc function. This getter exhausts its signal in order to conform the Controller to User's digital experience.
      Returns:
      conditional signal of esc
